webview_android.notes: Chrome disabled SharedArrayBuffer on January 5, 2018 to help reduce the efficacy of speculative side-channel attacks. This is intended as a temporary measure until other mitigations are in place.

edge.notes: Support was removed to mitigate speculative execution side-channel attacks (Windows blog).

firefox.notes: Support was disabled by default to mitigate speculative execution side-channel attacks (Mozilla Security Blog).
